thread.title: Thomas, (Bellshill, Scotland, still in E.U.)
thread.title_full: Kiwi Sheepskins reviewed by Thomas, (Bellshill, Scotland, still in E.U.)

author: Thomas, (Bellshill, Scotland, still in E.U.)
title: Thomas, (Bellshill, Scotland, still in E.U.)
text:
I live in the UK and Bought Manuka honey and royal jellly face cream, on the internet, for my wife, having brought some back from my travels in New Zealand.
I found it easy to purchase it as their instruction were clear regarding minimum pricing for goods and delivery was as stated. They kept me informed throughout the process.
